title: Devasena's Delight: Diamond & Gemstone Elephant Vaddanam
materials: Natural Emeralds (approx. 4.82 carats - 7 stones). Features Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting sheen.

The central hexagonal motif is adorned with a large emerald, surrounded by meticulously set polki diamonds. The design incorporates traditional South Indian elements while maintaining a contemporary elegance, ideal for the modern bride. The flexible design allows for comfortable wear.
